full_summary:
# Official Tender Announcement
## Furniture Purchase Contract - Panel Systems and HA Desks
### Solicitation Number: WS4302530785
#### (_published on: *December 14, 2023*)

Summary
Amdt. 3: The Canadian Armed Forces Recruitment Centre requires bids for the purchase and delivery of panelling systems and HA (height-adjustable) desks. A compliance matrix, detailing the required specifications and installation instructions, is part of the mandatory tender documentation. 

**Critical Tender Update:** To afford all participants equal opportunity, the closing time for submission of bids has been extended to 14:00 EST on January 19, 2024. This supersedes the earlier timestamp divulged through Ariba Discovery and CanadaBuys. Submissions received after the designated time will be declared non-responsive.

**Procurement Details:**
---------------------------------------------------------

*   Project Code: ET025-241210
*   Appropriated Budget: To be disclosed upon project initiation
*   Anticipated Start Date of the contract: *February 26, 2024*
*   Estimated contract end date: *January 15, 2025*
*   Procurement Method: Competitive Bidding
*   Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

**Required Deliverables and Trade Agreements:**
Carefully review the list below and ensure your response complies with these requirements:

*   Desks (UNSPSC 56101703)
*   Panel screens for mobile partition systems (UNSPSC 56111601)
*   Work surfaces (UNSPSC 56112204)

In line with the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), this solicitation is open to all qualified bidders.

**Project Delivery and Users:**

*   Winnipeg, Manitoba
*   To be assigned to the Canadian Army (CA), Royal Canadian Air Force (RCAF), or Royal Canadian Navy (RCN) end-user entities.

**How to Respond:**

*   Respond to this solicitation by downloading the mandatory compliance matrix and submitting your response by January 19, 2024, 14:00 EST.
*   For full project terms and conditions, kindly visit:
    *   [The official solicitation notice URL](https://discovery.ariba
